p: Zingiberis Rhizoma Recens (ZRR) is the fresh rhizoma of Zingiber officinale Roscoe and has a long history as an effective traditional Chinese medicine. The use of ZRR can be traced from the Shen Nong Ben Cao Jing. In Chinese Pharmacopoeia, ZRR has the function of relieving exterior syndrome and dispersing cold and warming middle energizer to arrest vomiting. It is mostly used to treat cold, vomiting, and cough caused by wind weather. ZRR is distributed in China, India, Indonesia, Nigeria, and other countries and is famous for its antiemetic effect.
